pages.text: [#](bb00bb)Totems of Undying[#](), while having a powerful effect, have the significant disadvantage that you always have to hold them in your hand.\\Using the protective powers of $(l:general/pigment#blue)Blue Pigment$(/l) as a focus you can keep its life-saving effect active, even when worn around the neck.

pages.title: Fusion Recipe
pages.text: One-time protection from death. After it is triggered, crumbles into dust.
